oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mid-summer bare fallow effective in controlling perennial weeds
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kakriainen-Rouhiainen, Sanna
Väisänen, Jaana
Vanhala, Petri
Lötjönen, Timo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The results of this study suggest that stubble cultivation before ploughing is the most effective way to reduce the amount of E. repens when bringing the long-term ley to an end.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kakriainen-Rouhiainen, Sanna; Väisänen, Jaana; Vanhala, Petri and Lötjönen, Timo (2003) Mid-summer bare fallow effective in controlling perennial weeds. Paper at: Nordic agriculture in global perspective: NJF's 22nd congress, Turku, Finland, July 1-4, 2003.
